name: Armament 2028 Lite
description:
This is the lite version of Armament 2028, a traditional turn-based strategy game played on a hexagonal map.
Armament 2028 is a new game from developers of Assault Commander Ultimate.

Features:
3 single player missions in 3 campaigns.
Various unit types including infantry, tanks, artillery, ships and other units of advanced future warfare.
Buildings including factories and resource collectors.
Advanced AI.
Three difficulty levels for single player maps.
Realistic sounds and great soundtracks.
Tactical map by pinch and zoom on the screen.
Game Center leaderboards.
Save and load games from Main Menu, autosave.

Some user comments of previous or current version of the full version of the game:

Lizz Pons: "Few words can easily describe this game: Armament is the chess of war games."
CaptChris69: "This is without a doubt one of the best TBS games for a tablet that I have ever played."
